column1: # Provides the verification info of the remote TPM info
# mac: MAC address of the remote machine
# ipv4: IPv4 address of the remote machine
# aikPubKeyLen: length of the AIK public key of the remote TPM
# aikPubKeyFilePath: the key file usually under ./tpmdb
# pcrMask: PCR mask - based on 24 PCRs
# pcrLen: length of the PCR good value file of the remote TPM
# pcrFilePath: the pcr file usually under ./tpmdb
